title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.100 - Oxidizing materials referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.100 - Oxidizing materials referenced to this section

State Regulations

Oxidizing materials listed in section
1211.150
for reference to this
section are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 100 pounds gross
weight-- provided, however, such oxidizing materials are in outside containers
of 35 pounds gross weight, or less, or, for contents customarily described by
volume, six one-half gallons, or less. There are no restrictions on the
transport of empty containers which last contained such oxidizing material
provided the accompanying shipping papers show them to be
empty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.100

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
